mapper.insert: INSERT INTO imagination_playground.user_baby (user_id, `name`, age, gender, profile, `character`, `hospital_id`, registered_date, modified_date) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{profile}, #{character}, #{hospital_id}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM imagination_playground.user_baby WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM imagination_playground.user_baby WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM imagination_playground.user_baby WHERE `hospital_id` = #{hospital_id} AND (age BETWEEN #{age_1} AND #{age_2}) AND name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{name}, "%")
AND gender = #{gender}

SELECT * FROM imagination_playground.user_baby baby LEFT OUTER JOIN imagination_playground.baby_record record ON baby.id = record.baby_id WHERE baby.id = #{baby_id} AND baby.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY recorded_date DESC
